summary: The code iterates through command line parameters, forming a service string to be used with the "ls" command. It then outputs the result into a file named ".local-service".

details.comment: The code iterates through command line parameters, forming a service string to be used with the "ls" command. It then outputs the result into a file named ".local-service".
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
service=""
for parameter in "$@"
do
service="$service /$parameter/d; "
done
# echo $service
cd hotfix
ls | sed "$service" > .local-service
